TopicTitle: Spazzed out struts and fuel lines after laythe encounter

Articles.Content:
So I've noticed a lot of bugs while building my Laythe station, the first of which is noted here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57432-Can-t-rotate-a-part-on-RCS-after-undocking

The second bug is one I've seen mentioned here before, upon setting up a Laythe encounter, the pink encounter line just goes all wobbly, it's not a smooth arc. No biggie.

But now, after docking my SSTO spaceplane with the station, I've gotten this wierd bug where the struts and fuel lines just spazzed out and point in random directions.

Here's a close-up:

Anyone know why this happens?

Edit - it seems to fly just fine, and the fuel feeds the way its supposed to despite the crazy fuel lines. Just looks weird as hell. I just set her down on Laythe.

Edited November 10, 2013 by Agent86
It's likely some form of the Kraken hitting you and displacing the locations of them.
